answerText: uniform distribution[10] An alternate derivation of the microcanonical ensemble defines it as the ensemble for which this property is maximal, given the information known about its components. Temperature is defined as the derivative of internal energy with respect to it.

question: Question:  [10] In the microcanonical ensemble, the occupation probability of microstates follows this distribution on the energies for which it is supported.
